segments.text: In this kitchen, everything seems so fragile and on the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in her task, but the overflow makes me worry for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the floor and cabinets right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the danger pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the unstable stool could tumble and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the jar looks desperate, like he shouldn't have to climb like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face tugs at my heart; she's too young for this peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, a stark reminder of what safety looks like.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby might shatter if anything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how routine turns hazardous so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and prevent the sorrow ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene fills me with a quiet melancholy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocence of the kids amid the risks is truly poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR
